title: ShearDisplacementStructureView
description: <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructureView</font> is a simplified view of a GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>. In GeoSciML terms this will be an instance of a <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font> with key property values from the associated <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font> feature summarised as labels (unconstrained character strings) or arbitrarily selected classifiers to be used for thematic mapping purposes. The latter are the properties suffixed with “_uri” and will contain URIs referring to controlled concepts in published vocabularies.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description:
Globally unique <font color="#4f81bd">identifier:Primitive::CharacterString</font> shall uniquely identifies a tuple within the dataset. Identifiers shall be formatted as URI according to RFC 3986.  This URI could be used to access more detailed, such as a GeoSciML Basic, representation of the feature.
It should have the same value as the corresponding GeoSciML MappedFeature identifier if available.

name.title: name
name.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">name:Primitive::CharacterString </font>contains a display name for the ShearDisplacementStructure.

description.title: description
description.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">description:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a human readable text description of the ShearDisplacementStructure, typically taken from an entry on a geological map legend.

faultType.title: faultType
faultType.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">faultType:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a human readable description of the type of <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font> (as defined in GeoSciML). To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, faultType_uri shall be used.

movementType.title: movementType
movementType.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">movementType:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a human readable summary of the type of movement (e.g. dip-slip, strike-slip) on the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>. To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">movementType_uri </font>shall be used.

deformationStyle.title: deformationStyle
deformationStyle.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">deformationStyle:Primitive::CharacterString </font>contain a human readable description of the style of deformation (e.g. brittle, ductile etc.) for the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>.  To report an identifier from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">deformationStyle_uri</font> shall be used.

displacement.title: displacement
displacement.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">displacement:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a text summarising the displacement across the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>.

geologicHistory.title: geologicHistory
geologicHistory.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">geologicHistory:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a text, possibly formatted with formal syntax, describing the age of the ShearDisplacementStructure (where age is a sequence of events and may include process and environment information).  To report identifiers from a controlled vocabulary, <font color="#4f81bd">representativeAge_uri, representativeOlderAge_uri and representativeYoungerAge_uri</font> shall be used.

observationMethod.title: observationMethod
observationMethod.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">observationMethod:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a metadata snippet indicating how the spatial extent of the feature was determined. <font color="#4f81bd">ObservationMethod</font> is a convenience property that provides a quick and dirty approach to observation metadata when data are reported using a feature view (as opposed to observation view).

positionalAccuracy.title: positionalAccuracy
positionalAccuracy.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">positionAccuracy:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains quantitative representation defining the radius of an uncertainty buffer around a <font color="#4f81bd">MappedFeature</font> (e.g., a <font color="#4f81bd">positionalAccuracy</font> of 100 m for a line feature defines a buffer polygon of total width 200 m centred on the line).

source.title: source
source.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">source:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a text describing feature-specific details and citations to source materials, and if available providing URLs to reference material and publications describing the geologic feature. This could be a short text synopsis of key information that would also be in the metadata record referenced by <font color="#4f81bd">metadata_uri</font>.

faultType_uri.title: faultType_uri
faultType_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">faultType_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept from a vocabulary defining the fault (<font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>) type.

movementType_uri.title: movementType_uri
movementType_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">movementType_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept from a vocabulary defining the ShearDisplacementStructure movement type.

deformationStyle_uri.title: deformationStyle_uri
deformationStyle_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">deformationStyle_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept from a vocabulary defining the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font> deformation style.

representativeAge_uri.title: representativeAge_uri
representativeAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeAge_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative stratigraphic age interval for the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising all or part of the feature's history.

representativeOlderAge_uri.title: representativeOlderAge_uri
representativeOlderAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeOlderAge_uri:Primitive:CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative lower value in a range of stratigraphic age intervals for the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising all or part of the feature's history.

representativeYoungerAge_uri.title: representativeYoungerAge_uri
representativeYoungerAge_uri.description: The property <font color="#4f81bd">representativeYoungerAge_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a controlled concept specifying the most representative upper value in a range of stratigraphic age intervals for the <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font>. This will be defined entirely at the discretion of the data provider and may be a single event selected from the geologic feature's geological history or a value summarising all or part of the feature's history.

numericOlderAge.title: numericOlderAge
numericOlderAge.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">numericOlderAge:Primitive::Number</font> reports the older age of the fault/shear structure, represented million years (Ma).

numericYoungerAge.title: numericYoungerAge
numericYoungerAge.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">numericYoungerAge:Primitive::Number</font> reports the younger age of the fault/shear structure, represented million years (Ma).

specification_uri.title: specification_uri
specification_uri.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">specification_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring the GeoSciML <font color="#4f81bd">ShearDisplacementStructure</font> feature that describes the instance in detail.

metadata_uri.title: metadata_uri
metadata_uri.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">metadata_uri:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains a URI referring to a metadata record describing the provenance of data.

genericSymbolizer.title: genericSymbolizer
genericSymbolizer.description: If present, the property <font color="#4f81bd">genericSymbolizer:Primitive::CharacterString</font> contains an identifier for a symbol from standard (locally or community defined) symbolization scheme for portrayal.

any-1.title: any
any-1.description: A data provider can add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.

any-2.title: any
any-2.description: A data provider can add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.

any-3.title: any
any-3.description: A data provider can add an arbitrary number of extra properties, as long as the instance is conformant to GML Simple Feature Level 0.
